channel.title: Leedle 317! Customs | Easy Bossing | Custom NPCs | Reward Points
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/4jmes6.gif[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k_YHaMpY7Bw[/youtube][/center]
Leedle is a 317 loading 454. This is unlike any server you've ever played, mainly because of our custom pvm system and our customs themselves!
We have SO MUCH to offer, including a donator-zone, A CUSTOM POINT SYSTEM WITH REWARDS, 20+ custom bosses, 150+ custom items, 20 unique boss zones, a custom ::afk system and a unique home area. There are endless things to do on our server so come play today! I'm a very dedicated owner, who aims to present an enjoyable server to the public. I'm frequently adding new content so there's always something new!
[size=18pt]Forums:[/size] http://www.leedlescape.com [size=18pt]Client:[/size]http://leedlescape.com/index.php?board=19.0
[center][size=18pt]Original to Leedle:[/size] [/center] [center]- Exclusive donator zone with donator-only NPC's! - Custom leedle point system with cool rewards! - Over 20 custom NPC bosses! - 150+ custom items! - 15+ unique areas with NPC's! - Afk system with unique objects such as benches, thrones and chairs! - Adjusted item stats for higher hits! - Max combat level of 166! - Max skill level of 130! - Fun in-game player commands! - Yell chat rights for everyone! - Custom colors in yell chat! - Adjusted weapon hit speeds for unique weapons! - Unique Multi-NPC zone with custom Fairy Zone reward points! - Fairy Zone Shop with customs you can purchase via Fairy Zone points![/center] There's way more for you to explore!
[size=12pt]Here are some of the custom items we have: We have way more for you to check out![/size]
* Supreme Claws
* Fusha Cav
* 20 Custom Bandos Chestplates
*Ghostly Bow
*Ghostly Guthans Armor
*Bankai Sword
*Farmer's Hat
*Bandos Full Helm
*Demon Head, Tail, Feet, Hands, Horns
*Zodiac Robes
*Butters Robes
*Beautiful Cape
*Dlord Legs, Chest and Cape
*Bandos WarSpear
*Obsidian Armor
*Ninja Armor
*Samurai Armor
*Bowsword
*Different types of Katanas
*Sword of Fear
*Danger Cape
*Dragon Cape
*Evil Dave top and bottom
*Tri-Godsword
*LemonLime Set
*Titan set
*Custom Santas
[size=12pt]Here are some of the NPC's we have:
We have way more for you to check out![/size]
*Big Swole
*Leeches
*Phoenix
*The Lion
*God
*Leeches
*Ogre Shamen
*Zygomites
*Rockgolem
*Gayboy
*Gnome Terrorbirds
*The Mummy
*Tiny Knights
*Spirit Crabs
*Zombie Monkies
*Anger Npcs
*Wyvern
*Shades
*Super Mourners
*Ghostly Vampires
We also have A BRAND NEW CUSTOM FAIRY ZONE! There are 6 new npcs located there, which you kill for "Fairy Points"! Each npc has a random fairy point reward ranging from 3-6, as well as their own individual drop tables. You can use the points you earn at the Fairy shop to buy awesome weapons and gear!
[URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/aranks_zpsujqouehx.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/aranks_zpsujqouehx.png[/img][/URL]
Working Guns! [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/Guns_zpspebuj1na.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/Guns_zpspebuj1na.png[/img][/URL]
Gun Zone Npc's! [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/Agrith_zpsqqmoc34j.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/Agrith_zpsqqmoc34j.png[/img][/URL]

(contains the Flambeed, which drops working ring of wealth!): [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/flambeed_zpsrzbifc7t.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/flambeed_zpsrzbifc7t.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/Wyvern_zps3f59278f.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/Wyvern_zps3f59278f.png[/img][/URL]

[URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/TINYKNIGHT_zps9844c007.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/TINYKNIGHT_zps9844c007.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/SpiritCrab_zps524f4b66.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/SpiritCrab_zps524f4b66.png[/img][/URL]
New ::dad zone! (the two pictures below) [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/dad_zpstzokyhas.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/dad_zpstzokyhas.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/sea%20troll_zpsoalzyo5o.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/sea%20troll_zpsoalzyo5o.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/SANTA_zpse416299c.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/SANTA_zpse416299c.png[/img][/URL]
[size=10pt][color=blue][size=14pt]The picture below is of the home area. Since it's hard to get a good shot of the whole area, I'll list what's there/what it is. [URL=http://s1056.photobucket.com/user/beemokid/media/Home_zps0xwba6vd.png.html][IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t369/beemokid/Home_zps0xwba6vd.png[/img][/URL]
-Dwarven Consortium home base -Shops (will be moved to ::shops) -Crystal Key chest which give medium rewards. -Black Chest for Ancestral keys, which give very good rewards. -Kalphite portal, mainly just for slayer. -Magic altars/Prayer Altar.
[size=18pt]It's important for future players to know that this server is still very fun even if you don't donate. There are roughly 20 Free to Play Custom bosses, and although donors have the advantage of obtaining weapons Free players can't, there are no "donor locks" on weapons. Any player can wield any weapon.[/size]
EDIT: Recent updates include: - Gun zone which contains three npc's that drop working guns! - Row zone which includes the Flambeed boss, which drops working row! - Dad zone which contains the Dad boss, as well as sea troll minions! Dad drops new cataclysmic armor and bone club, Sea troll minions drop full custom Ivandis!

@wimstr wrote:

Latest updates.

New forums
http://leedlescape.com/

-Crystal key chest re-vamp (New rewards)

  • Lava Helm
  • Lava Shield
  • Lava Gauntlets
  • Lava Blade
  • Lava Boots
  • Lava Chain
  • Lava Platelegs
  • Addy Santa hat (no stats)
  • Peach Plate body
  • Peach Platelegs
  • Vesta’s longsword
  • Arma Crossbow

Gun zone has been added (Ak47, MP5, Deagle)

leedlescape.freeforums.net

The ::GUN ZONE | LeedleScape

Hello everyone! I'm very proud to present to you the brand new Multi- Npc zone; ::GUNS! This zone is special because due to the release of Leedle clientv1.6, guns have been added to the server!

item.title: Leedle 317! Customs | Easy Bossing | Custom NPCs | Reward Points
item.dc:creator: @Beemobmo71 Beemobmo71
item.description:
@Beemobmo71 wrote:

The next update will include a ::buytitle system, in which you can buy custom titles with via npc points! Our amazing coder will also be implementing multiple significant updates which includes:

  • A better magic system
  • Better Player vs NPC
  • Revamping food (eating)
  • updating thieving stystem (better cash rewards)
  • Better prayer system

Plenty to do, Lots to enjoy!

[quote=“killa kronic, post:29, topic:552292”]Server is very bad… Nothing to do afterwards. No pking, no nothing. The server has a bad eco on all honestly. Everything is pretty much just a rare item. If you wan’t to have arguments then this server is also a good place. Great owner and a good admin. New mod is a fudgeing dick. Seems like a nice person, work with him and you should see why.

In all honestly (rage aside) i don’t care it does get boring afterwards and I don’t see it doing very well.[/quote]
It’s completely alright that you don’t like my server. I only ask that you leave your insignificant quarrels with another player out of my advertisement thread, because:
1.) It is Unprofessional
2.) My advertisement thread is not the place for it.
3.) It is irrelevant

I’m 100% O.K. with the negative feedback, the other part not so much.

Read full topic

bump bump bump bump bump

Awesome community, active developers and staff members.

Also new V1.6 client!

[quote=“killa kronic, post:29, topic:552292”]Server is very bad… Nothing to do afterwards. No pking, no nothing. The server has a bad eco on all honestly. Everything is pretty much just a rare item. If you wan’t to have arguments then this server is also a good place. Great owner and a good admin. New mod is a fudgeing dick. Seems like a nice person, work with him and you should see why.

In all honestly (rage aside) i don’t care it does get boring afterwards and I don’t see it doing very well.[/quote]

You’re so sad to turn from positive into a negative ignorant guy.
Positivity changes when you do your best, and it doesn’t go as planned.
With writhing negative comments on this thread, you’re blaming everyone around Leedlescape.
Everyone will be affected since there’s a change, there will be less players due to your comments.
Man up and fix your problems with the person concerning the situation.
